allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: resolve ESLint warnings and consolidate documentation

- Fix 5 non-exhaustive switch statements with default cases
  - Add ESLint disable comments with clear justifications
  - MessageHandler, WebWorkerInterpreter, useBasicIdeMessageHandlers
  - Test integration helpers for CGSET and COLOR
- Fix v-html warning in CodeEditor with justification comment
- Consolidate 6 analysis docs into single code-quality-status.md
  - Remove redundant best-practices and ESLint planning docs
  - Create comprehensive current status document

Result: Reduced ESLint warnings from 88 to 82 \(6 resolved\)
All remaining warnings are nullish coalescing suggestions \(safe to address incrementally\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
